actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to increase the expertise and capacity of community-based organizations involved in economic development activities and key development programs.
short_title: Community Economic Development Expertise Enhancement Act of 2003

summary.text: Community Economic Development Expertise Enhancement Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to increase the capacity and expertise of qualifying community-based economic development organizations. Directs the Secretary to: (1) conduct an assessment of such organizations' capability needs; and (2) establish the Advisory Council on Community Economic Development. Directs the President to include with each annual budget request a report regarding Federal financial support for community economic development.

titles.title: Community Economic Development Expertise Enhancement Act of 2003
A bill to increase the expertise and capacity of community-based organizations involved in economic development activities and key development programs.
